title: About Browncoat
description: Browncoat is a html, scss, and js framework. It provides a folder structure for assets, a configurable gulp setup, and internal styleguide creation. Browncoat uses semver specifications.
The key words MUST, MUST NOT, REQUIRED, SHALL, SHALL NOT, SHOULD, SHOULD NOT, RECOMMENDED, MAY, and OPTIONAL in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119.

sections.title: Start Here
description: Browncoat SHOULD be downloaded from the browncoat github page. It MUST be downloaded (e.g. zip file download) and not forked or cloned unless contributing to the browncoat project.
Once the project is open to the base directory (ie. level where `package.json` is found) the commands below can be run.

sections.title: Gulp Task Management
sections.description: `npm run gulp` or `npm run docs` kick off a watch task. Changes to scss, js, html, md, or json files will trigger recompilling. Changes will also trigger browsersync to reload or stream changes. See `gulp` section for details.
